title: Trillian Astra Build 75
description:
There are no patch out for this build yet but there is a workaround

First of all you\&#039;ll need to create a username in trillian astra inside the client.


1.Just type in a name .Any name at all.We\&#039;ll just call it bear and the password can be apples

2.Now when you try to connect it won\&#039;t connect right?Exit out of trillian


3.Locate and go into this
C:\\Document and Settings\\YourName\\Application Data\\Trillian\\users\\bear


4.Find the file ASTRA-bear.ini.Open it

5. You\&#039;ll see a line that says prefsConnectionSettingsServerPort=3158

6. Change the number from 3158 to 4444

7.Now save the file and try logging on in trillian
